Question: That's not meant to criticize this person's earlier efforts [...].
Hints: The album's title was, in part, drawn from the reasons for this person's divorce from Carly Simon.
This person commented "I heard him shot—five, just as quick as you could pull the trigger, about five explosions".
On December 7, 1980, this person had an encounter with Mark David Chapman who would assassinate John Lennon just one day later.
